title: Mark Describes a New Paradigm for the 4 Ps of Knowing: also, the Parabolic as Scale Invariance
description:
Karen learns from Mark Lefebvre about a new way to look at John Vervaeke's 4 Ps of knowing, by shifting one Perspectival to a foundational mode, and adding the Parabolic as one of the 4 Ps. Lots of good content if you are avid enough to stay for the whole discussion:-)
Scroll down for a note from Mark with links to his work.

Resources:
Mark on Paul VanderKlay's channel:
https://youtu.be/q_hH6mudwsk

Karl Friston on the Free Energy Principle and Markov Blankets
https://youtu.be/NIu_dJGyIQI
https://youtu.be/j53lfLyFOPA

Videos on Barfield:
Imagination and Reason:  https://youtu.be/q-C7iJE0YFY
Vervaeke, Peterson & Barfield:  https://youtu.be/SiVD5z_9omQ
Other Barfield videos on The Meaning Code:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCgp_r6WlBwDSJrP43Mz07GQ/search?query=Barfield

A note from Mark Lefebvre:
John Vervaeke makes all of these conversations possible for me and others. Thank you so much John!
Join us on the Awakening From the Meaning Crisis discord, where we have great conversations every day and a number of practices you can participate in!
https://discord.gg/3TmZCGyQz7

The Meaning Community is our website project to showcase the work of John Vervaeke and hub for all the sites related to addressing the meaning crisis!
Copies of the slide are here as well! Come and participate with us as we build a community of like minded individuals working on the issues around meaning.
https://meaningcommunity.com/
